name: Wildlife Incremental - Nature
description:
Tired and exhausted from your daily life, you may want to go to the wild and release yourself. Wildlife Incremental is a new simulation & incremental game which brings you the feeling of nature and wildlife. There are several regions with hundreds of real wild species. You can find more and more species as you go.

Game Features:
Names, taxonomies and descriptions confirmed by biologists to provide valuable and educational information.
Graphics and animations based on biology and geography.
Collections classified by biology taxonomies.
Species cards that could be upgraded.
Immersive background music is various with geological regions.
More content to be revealed by yourself ...

Enjoy!

If you have any suggestions, please feel free to send us your feedbacks to service@capplay.com
